```{r}
der_like_11_7 <- function (p) {
  ((7*(1-p)-4*p)/(p*(1-p)))^2
}

der_like_110_70 <- function (p) {
  ((70*(1-p)-40*p)/(p*(1-p)))^2
}

fischers_11_7 <- sapply(seq(from =0.001, to=0.999, by=0.001), der_like_11_7)
mean(fischers_11_7)

fischers_110_70 <- sapply(seq(from =0.001, to=0.999, by=0.001), der_like_110_70)
mean(fischers_110_70)

#Fisher's of n=110 and H=70 is 100 times greater than Fisher's of n=11 and H=7, meaning a more precise value that maximizes L(p|x).
```
